English: Good work. It looks like everyone got away.
Chinese: 辛苦了，大家都逃出來了吧。
Korean: 수고했어. 다 도망간 모양이네
German: Gute Arbeit. Anscheinend konnten alle entkommen.

English: Ah...
German: Uh ...

English: It's nothing. I just got a little dizzy.
Chinese:
……沒事。
只是有點頭暈而已。
Korean:
……아냐, 아무것도 아냐.
조금 현기증이 났을 뿐이야
German: Es ist nichts. Mir wurde nur etwas schwindelig.

English:
I should take you to the hospital!
It's because you're not eating properly.
Have you been getting enough sleep lately?
Chinese:
糟糕了，趕快去醫院吧！
一定是因為沒有好好吃飯吧
最近有好好睡覺嗎？
Korean:
큰일이야, 병원으로 가자!
제대로 안 먹어서 그런 거야
요즘 잠은 제대로 자?
German:
Ich sollte dich zum Krankenhaus bringen!
Du ernährst dich einfach nicht richtig.
Hast du in letzter Zeit genug geschlafen?

English:
Don't overreact. It's probably just because
I haven't been eating much lately.
Chinese:
不要這樣，不要這麼誇張。
……可能是因為，最近都沒吃什麼東西吧。
Korean:
그만둬, 야단 떨지 마.
……요즘 거의 안 먹어서 그런 거니까
German:
Bleib auf dem Teppich. Das liegt wahrscheinlich
nur daran, dass ich in letzter Zeit nicht viel
gegessen habe.

English:
I've had so much work to do these days; I haven't
found time to eat.
Chinese:
最近這幾天，有很多不得不查的事情。
只是覺得吃東西很麻煩而已。
Korean:
요 며칠간 조사해야 할 일이 많아서
먹는 게 귀찮았을 뿐이야
German:
Ich habe zurzeit so viel zu tun, dass ich kaum zum
Essen komme.

English:
I've never felt dizzy from not eating enough.
I'll be fine.
Chinese:
之前也沒發生過不吃東西，身體就變糟的狀況，
沒事的。
Korean:
좀 안 먹은 정도로 몸이 이상해지는 경우는
여태껏 없었고, 괜찮으니까
German:
Mir ist noch nie schwindlig geworden, weil ich zu
wenig gegessen habe. Das wird schon wieder.

English: I haven't had time to eat.
Chinese: …………因為，覺得吃飯的時間很可惜呀。
Korean: …………하지만 먹을 시간이 아까운걸
German: Ich hatte keine Zeit zum Essen.

English:
I've been monitoring teams that are potentially
hostile to Hudie, as well as doing a million and one
other things.
Chinese:
我除了確認可能會跟hudie反目的隊伍動向之外，
還有其他很多事情要做。
Korean:
후디에에게 적대할 것 같은 팀의 동향을 체크하는 등
이것저것 할 게 있거든
German:
Ich habe Teams im Auge behalten, die Hudie
gegenüber eventuell feindlich gesinnt sind und
nebenbei tausend andere Sachen gemacht.

English:
I thought there wouldn't be any harm in skipping
a few meals here and there.
Chinese:
所以才稍微忙碌了起來，
沒吃東西的話也沒關係……
Korean:
그래서 조금 바빠지는 바람에
안 먹어도 별로 상관없겠지 싶어서……
German:
Ich dachte, es wäre nicht so schlimm, wenn ich
hier und da eine Mahlzeit überspringe.

English: But I know now. You're right.
Chinese: ……我知道你想說的啦。
Korean: ……알아, 네가 하는 소리가 맞다는 것 정도는
German: Aber jetzt weiß ich es besser. Du hast recht.

English:
I slept early yesterday. I'm definitely getting
enough sleep.
Chinese: ……昨天很早就睡了喔，我還是會睡覺的。
Korean: ……어젠 일찍 잤어. 아무리 그래도 수면은 취하거든
German:
Ich bin gestern früh ins Bett gegangen.
Ich bekomme definitiv genug Schlaf.

English:
I think it's because I haven't been eating enough.
I've had so much work to do lately.
Chinese:
大概是因為，沒吃什麼東西的關係吧。
最近要查的事情太多了。
Korean:
아마 식사를 별로 안 해서 그런 것 같아
요즘 조사해야 할 게 많아서
German:
Es liegt sicher daran, dass ich nicht genug esse.
Zurzeit habe ich viel zu viel zu tun.

English:
I never thought there'd be any harm in skipping
a few meals here and there.
Chinese: 反正之前也沒發生過不吃東西，身體就變糟的狀況。
Korean:
조금 안 먹은 정도로 몸이 이상해지는 경우는
여태껏 없었으니까
German:
Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass es so schlimm wäre,
wenn ich hier und da eine Mahlzeit überspringe.

English: Are you really that worried about me?
Chinese: 我說……為什麼你會這麼擔心我？
Korean:
저기……왜 그렇게 걱정해?
나를
German: Machst du dir wirklich so große Sorgen um mich?

English: It feels like you're treating me like a child.
Chinese:
你以為你是誰啊？
感覺，我就好像是被當作小孩子一樣對待。
Korean:
너, 자기가 뭐라도 된 것 같아?
마치 어린애 취급받는 것 같은데
German: Ich finde, du behandelst mich wie ein Kind.

English: ...Give me a break.
German: ... Lass mich in Ruhe.

English:
Sometimes you sound like my parents...but you're
just you.
Chinese:
明明只是[p]……
不要跟爸爸媽媽說一樣的話啊……
Korean:
[p] 주제에……
아빠랑 엄마 같은 소리 하지 말라고……
German:
Manchmal klingst du wie meine Eltern ... Aber du
bist einfach nur du.

English: Sorry...
German: Tut mir leid ...

English:
I'll make sure I eat enough so you don't need to
worry about me.
Chinese:
我知道了，為了不讓你擔心，
我會好好吃飯，不會讓身體不舒服的程度。
Korean:
알았어. 너한테 걱정 끼치지 않도록
몸에 무리가 가지 않는 정도로는 먹기로 할게
German:
Ich werde darauf achten, genug zu essen, damit du
dir keine Sorgen um mich machen musst.

English: I really don't like people telling me what to do.
Chinese: ……真是，真愛多管閒事呢。
Korean: ……정말 참견쟁이라니까
German:
Ich mag es überhaupt nicht, wenn mir jemand
Vorschriften macht.

English: It's nothing. Let's not talk about this anymore.
Chinese: 沒什麼，這件事已經結束了。
Korean: 아무것도 아냐. 이제 이 이야긴 끝이야
German: Vergiss es. Reden wir nicht mehr darüber.

English: Here. I brought loads. Take it.
Chinese:
這個給你。
這我有很多，你就拿去吧。
Korean:
자, 이거
많이 가져왔으니까 갖고 가
German:
Hier. Ich habe jede Menge mitgebracht.
Bedien dich.

English:
I'm going to go home, have something to eat and go
to bed. I'm a little tired. It's been ages since
I've been able to get some rest at home.
Chinese:
回去後吃完飯就睡覺吧，今天也有點累了呢。
……久違的回去家裡休息好了。
Korean:
돌아가서 밥 먹고 잘게. 오늘은 좀 지쳤으니까
……오랜만에 집에서 잘까
German:
Ich werde heimgehen, etwas essen und ins Bett
gehen. Ich bin etwas müde. Es ist ewig her, dass
ich mich zu Hause ein bisschen ausruhen konnte.

English: Bye for now.
Chinese: 那麼，我先回去了喔。
Korean: 그럼 먼저 돌아갈게
German: Man sieht sich.
